data.message: I LOVE MARSHALL BRUCE MATHERS III, aka EMINEM, aka SLIM SHADY!!!!!!!!!!!! That isn't a fuckin joke so don't laugh or you can just piss off! I've been in LOVE with him for 10 years, and if you don't believe me then just ask anyone that knows me! Our, or should I say my Anniversary Date for him is December 5th 2004!!!!! He means EVERYTHING to me, and I would do anything to get to meet him... well almost anything, don't get any stupid ideas! I've tired everything I could think of to get to meet him so if anyone knows a way to contact him for me I would forever be in your debt, I could never repay you enough, so please help me if you have any ideas or information!!!!!!!! Also, I'm a real life Werewolf, and for anyone that doesn't know what I mean, to put it simply, I was born a Human with a Wolf Spirit, or... I am a Wolf but trapped inside a Human Body!!!!! I even have the ability to Shift, just not Physically yet, and I'm actually always partially-Shifted; which means I constantly think and have instincts like a Wolf but also somewhat Human too. I know it sounds crazy but hey, if God can exist then so can I with a Wolf inside me!!!! It's not exactly fun being a Wolf like this, but someday I will finally get to be the true me and be able to run free in the Wild where I belong!!!!
